summary: WAS DRIVING AT 60MPH ON THE TACONIC STATE PARKWAY WITH MY FAMILY ON FLAT PAVEMENT WHEN I HEARD A LOUD POP FROM THE REAR OF MY SAV LIKE TIRE BLEW OUT. PULLED OVER THINKING A TIRE POPPED. SAW NOTHING SO I KEPT DRIVING, I IMMEDIATELY NOTICED SOMETHING WASN'T RIGHT WITH THE SUSPENSION IN THE REAR OF THE TRUCK. HAD THE TRUCK TOWED TO A SHOP, BOTH OF THE REAR SPRINGS BROKE IN DIFFERENT LOCATIONS. THE PASSENGER REAR SPRING SHEERED OFF AT THE BOTTOM OF THE SPRING. THE DRIVER SIDE SHEERED OFF AT THE TOP. I HAVE NOT TAKEN ANY PICTURES YET BECAUSE IT IS IN THE SHOP BUT I CAN GET THEM LATER THIS WEEK.
